description: Development Partners Support to PRSP Process in Ethiopia

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The Project is used for providing support to coordination and facilitation of Development Assistance Group, support to harmonization processes including the High Level Forum secretariat at MOFED, support to formulation of PRSP, support to various DAG structures including Technical Working Groups, and other general issues which are of common interest to the DAG
donor_long: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: DAG Support to PRSP & MDGs

subproject.description:
This is to ensure:
1. Gender sensitive monitoring and evaluation system mainstreamed in PASDEP
2.  Institutional Capacity of Ministry of Women's Affairs is enhanced
3. Effective participatory dialogue regarding Gender Issues in Ethiopia
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Mainstreeming Gender Issues

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: targets include: Support to HICES, WMs, support to data base management of CSA, Capacity building support to MoFED and CSA, poverty mapping and analysis, participation of the governement official in international conferences and experience sharing visit, strategic studies that informs the M&E system of PASDEP. Enhanced awareness on the PASDEP and MDGs
